senses.sense_definition: To grind or crush a substance into a fine powder or pulp.

examples.text: The pharmacist must <w>triturate</w> the solid ingredients before mixing them into the cream.
You should <w>triturate</w> the dried herbs to release their aromatic oils.

senses.sense_definition: To break up biological tissue into individual cells by forcing it repeatedly through a narrow opening.

examples.text: Scientists often <w>triturate</w> the tissue sample with a pipette to separate the cells.
We need to <w>triturate</w> the cell cluster gently to avoid damaging the membranes.
